channel.title: Deborah Fry on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Deborah Fry on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: Working together to safeguard and protect children and young people in sport
item.description: MD - Michelle Drumm SR - Shona Robison BS - Beth Smith CB - Campbell Bell DF - Deborah Fry Working Together to Safeguard and Protect Children and Young People in Sport conference was held on the 29th of October 2013 at Celtic Park. It was a partnership event of WithScotland and Children 1st. Shona Robison, Minister for Commonwealth Games and Sport was keynote speaker. Michelle Drum from Iriss.fm spoke to her before the event began.
